h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Mind Core Locations
content: Within Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge, you will reach the Crouching Tiger Temple. At the top of it, you will fight the Tiger Vanguard. Defeating this boss will give you a Mind Core.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mind_Core.md', within the main section titled 'Mind Core', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Mind Core Locations' and the sub-subsection 'Mind Core Location 5'.
The content is as follows:
Within Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge, you will reach the Crouching Tiger Temple. At the top of it, you will fight the Tiger Vanguard. Defeating this boss will give you a Mind Core.
